Articles.Content:
Hello. First, sorry for my bad english.

Since patch 1.0, my Kerbals are able to survive a free fall in kerbin, just using the jetpack to ease the falling. 

This happened both on land and water.

Is this a bug?

So you mean that instead of flying a plane I can now deal with "take crew report at surface/in flight below xxx alt" contracts just by deploying kerbals directly form orbit ? And poeople are complaining about difficulty ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

With KAS in .90 you could paradrop them too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That was always so much fun.
